Question: In the aftermath of the 2004 Asian tsunami, U.N Secretary-General Kofi Annan appointed this person to head a relief effort.
Hints: With no major Southern state remaining, this person targeted New York, which had many delegates.
This person came out for gay marriage in July 2009 and urged the Supreme Court to overturn DOMA in 2013.
While campaigning for U.S President, the then Governor **** returned to Arkansas to see that Ricky Ray Rector would be executed.
